text: Hello there
Good evening, how are you?
I am doing well- I hope the same for you!
I am doing great. Just had dinner.
Glad to hear it. I was wondering- have you ever heard of an organization called Save the Children? If not, I was hoping I could tell you a bit about what they do
I have briefly heard about it but I don't know much about it so I'd love to hear more.

I appreciate your openness. Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries. They rely solely on donations from people like you and I to help ensure children have access to healthcare, education, etc.
Do they help children in the U.S. as well?
Absolutely- all over the world. They are a really amazing organization.
Wow, that's pretty huge. Are there minimums for small donations if you don't have alot of money but want to donate?
No minimums whatsoever! I have friends that donate $5/month and it makes such a huge difference in the lives of these children.
I can imagine little bits adding up pretty quick if many people pitch in for such a great cause.
Exactly. And actually, I hope you don't mind me asking, but might you be willing to donate some or all of the money you're receiving for this specific task ($2) to the Save the Children organization?
I don't mind at all. I would like to donate $1.00 to this charity! Thank for the opportunity to get involved.
You are amazing- thank you so much for your generosity!! There are so many worthy causes out there but this one definitely holds a special place in my heart.
I think I will look this one up to learn more. You are very welcome.
I would encourage it- the website is  URL  Do you have children of your own?
Thank you for the website. Yes I have three children. Two are out of the house and grown. My youngest is 12.
How lovely! Your children are lucky to have such a great role model in you- I wish you nothing but the best in the future!
Same to you! Thanks so much.
